name: Self Heimlich Maneuver
description: Perform Heimlich on yourself when choking alone
warning: Use when choking and alone. Act quickly - you may lose consciousness.
emergency_notes: Try coughing first if you can
Use a hard surface if fist method doesn't work

steps.title: Try Coughing
steps.description: Try coughing until you are free of the object you are being choked on.
steps.voice_prompt: Try to cough forcefully to dislodge the object.
steps.critical_warning: If you can cough, try this first before other methods

steps.title: Find a Hard Surface
steps.description: If the object is still inside you, find a hard surface at the height of your belly.
steps.voice_prompt: Find a hard surface like a table, chair, or kitchen countertop at belly height.
steps.critical_warning: Examples: Table edge, chair back, kitchen countertop

steps.title: Lean on Surface
steps.description: Lean on the surface and slam your belly as hard as you can.
steps.voice_prompt: Lean on the hard surface and thrust your belly against it as hard as you can.

steps.title: Repeat Until Clear
steps.description: Repeatedly slam your belly while coughing until you are free of the object.
steps.voice_prompt: Repeat thrusts while coughing until the object is dislodged.
steps.critical_warning: Continue until object is expelled or you can breathe. If you become unconscious, emergency services should perform CPR.
